author: jainshilpi
body:
These are the scales and smearing text file for UL2016: 
includes both pre and post-VFP eras. 
Presented by @neilSchroeder and @rchatter in PPD here:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1009591/contributions/4245933/attachments/2196962/3714830/ul16_gainDependentScales.pdf

These files will be used in re-mini and nano. The related PR will be created.
title: UL2016 SS
